name: basketball_match_statistics
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sports_live_scores.
Tool description: We support different Sports. Bettings odds, livescores, rankings and match details included. Sports include Football, Tennis, Basketball, Crikcet, Futsal, Handball, Baseball, Table Tennis, Esports. Try it out and always feel free tor reach out to the team to add more endpoints!  
API description: Returns Statistics about a given match_id. The match does not have to be necessarily live but also finished. You can retrieve Match IDs from the Football Live Matches endpoint.

match_id.description: The identifier for the basketball match. Match IDs can be retrieved from the Basketball Live Matches endpoint.
